definitions: Definition Box (p : Prop) : Prop := PXL_Box W R p.
Definition Dia (p : Prop) : Prop := PXL_Dia W R p.
lemmas: Theorem ax_K : forall p q : Prop, □ (p -> q) -> □ p -> □ q.
Theorem ax_T : forall p : Prop, □ p -> p.
Theorem ax_Nec : forall p : Prop, p -> □ p.
Lemma ident_refl_derived : forall (x : Obj), x ⧟ x.
Lemma ident_symm_derived : forall (x y : Obj), x ⧟ y -> y ⧟ x.
Lemma ident_trans_derived : forall (x y z : Obj), x ⧟ y -> y ⧟ z -> x ⧟ z.
Lemma inter_comm_derived : forall (x y : Obj), x ⇌ y <-> y ⇌ x.
Lemma bridge_imp_intro : forall (p q : Prop), (p -> q) -> PImp p q.
Lemma bridge_imp_elim : forall (p q : Prop), PImp p q -> p -> q.
Lemma bridge_mequiv_intro : forall (p q : Prop), (p <-> q) -> MEquiv p q.
Lemma bridge_mequiv_elim : forall (p q : Prop), MEquiv p q -> p <-> q.
Lemma satisfies_I3 : forall P : Prop, P \/ ~ P.
Theorem LEM_Discharge : forall P : Prop, P \/ ~ P.

Axiom zero_is_void : zero ⧟ void.

Axiom add_comm      : forall x y : Obj, (x ⊕ y) ⧟ (y ⊕ x).
Axiom add_assoc     : forall x y z : Obj, ((x ⊕ y) ⊕ z) ⧟ (x ⊕ (y ⊕ z)).
Axiom add_zero_l    : forall x : Obj, (zero ⊕ x) ⧟ x.
Axiom add_opp_l     : forall x : Obj, ((⊖ x) ⊕ x) ⧟ zero.
Axiom mult_comm     : forall x y : Obj, (x ⊙ y) ⧟ (y ⊙ x).
Axiom mult_assoc    : forall x y z : Obj, ((x ⊙ y) ⊙ z) ⧟ (x ⊙ (y ⊙ z)).
Axiom mult_one_l    : forall x : Obj, (one ⊙ x) ⧟ x.
Axiom distrib_l     : forall x y z : Obj, (x ⊙ (y ⊕ z)) ⧟ ((x ⊙ y) ⊕ (x ⊙ z)).
